name: The End Of Days (AnsonRutherford)
description:
The Age Of Demons is coming to an end. But Beez, Lord Of Demons, refuses to cede power to the humans, nor their all-powerful lord, Clark. You will be the key to his plot to delay the oncoming Age Of Humans in perpetuity. Your means of helping: some weird mix of like, Katamari Damacy and Angry Birds gameplay I guess sure.

Windows  build recommended, all other platforms are last-minute ports and not guaranteed to work!

Entry for Ludum Dare 50, theme  of   Delay  The Inevitable. Submission Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/the-end-of-days
